Key Match Events: Isiah Kiner-Falefa had three hits, including a go-ahead single in the fifth inning to lead the Pirates past the Royals 4-3
Miscellaneous Highlights: Billy Cook's throw from right field beat Pham to preserve the tie. It came from near the line to the right of a No. 21 etched into the outfield grass on Roberto Clemente Day, observed across the majors
Others: The Pirates avoided a three-game sweep
Kansas City's Brady Singer (9-11) gave up four runs on six hits and four walks with six strikeouts in five innings
Carmen Mlodzinski (3-5) pitched a perfect fifth inning in relief of Pirates starter Jared Jones
Aroldis Chapman struck out one in a perfect ninth for his ninth save
